descriptionTitle: Uplift is a subscription-based car service
descriptionText1: that brings professional car cleaning directly to your home or workplace.
descriptionText2: Our goal is to save you time and make car care effortless, allowing you to focus on what matters most. With Uplift, you enjoy the convenience of a freshly cleaned car without disrupting your day.

promo.freeTrialSubtitle: Download the App and Create your Account

home.elevateExperience: Elevate your car experience with our services

Keeps your car fresh and clean.
features.Dusting_and_surface_cleaning_for_a_tidy_: Dusting and surface cleaning for a tidy interior.
features.Aromatizes_your_car_with_a_pleasant_scen: Aromatizes your car with a pleasant scent.
Shields surfaces from dirt and grime.
features.Provides_a_glossy_shine_and_protection_f: Provides a glossy shine and protection for your paint.
features.Keeps_wheels_and_tires_looking_their_bes: Keeps wheels and tires looking their best.
features.Includes_premium_cleaning_and_detailing_: Includes premium cleaning and detailing services.
